sqlMap.statement: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ABC_ANLS_RQST_IMPT_WRK WRK WHERE WRK.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND WRK.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND WRK.UPLD_CSV_RQST_PK = #UPLD_CSV_RQST_PK#

SELECT WRK.GLBL_CMPY_CD ,WRK.UPLD_CSV_RQST_PK ,WRK.UPLD_CSV_RQST_ROW_NUM ,WRK.ABC_ASG_NM ,WRK.MDSE_CD ,WRK.MDSE_DESC_SHORT_TXT ,WRK.RTL_WH_CATG_DESC_TXT ,WRK.RTL_WH_CD ,WRK.RTL_SWH_CD ,WRK.STK_STS_CD ,WRK.STK_STS_DESC_TXT ,WRK.CUR_INVTY_QTY ,WRK.CUR_INVTY_COST_AMT ,WRK.HIST_INVTY_TRX_QTY ,WRK.HIST_INVTY_TRX_COST_AMT ,WRK.HIST_INVTY_TRX_REC_CNT ,WRK.ABC_ANLS_CLS_NM ,WRK.ABC_ANLS_CLS_TAG_CD FROM ABC_ANLS_RQST_IMPT_WRK WRK WHERE WRK.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND WRK.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND WRK.UPLD_CSV_RQST_PK = #UPLD_CSV_RQST_PK# ORDER BY WRK.ABC_ASG_NM ,WRK.ABC_ANLS_CLS_NM ,WRK.MDSE_CD ,WRK.RTL_WH_CD ,WRK.RTL_SWH_CD ,WRK.STK_STS_CD
SELECT ASG.ABC_ASG_PK FROM ABC_ASG ASG WHERE ASG.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND ASG.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ASG.ABC_ASG_NM = #ABC_ASG_NM#
SELECT COUNT(MDSE.MDSE_CD) FROM MDSE MDSE WHERE MDSE.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND MDSE.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND MDSE.MDSE_CD = #MDSE_CD#
SELECT COUNT(WH.RTL_WH_CD) FROM RTL_WH WH WHERE WH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND WH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND WH.RTL_WH_CD = #RTL_WH_CD#
SELECT COUNT(SWH.RTL_SWH_CD) FROM RTL_SWH SWH WHERE SWH.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND SWH.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SWH.RTL_WH_CD = #RTL_WH_CD# AND SWH.RTL_SWH_CD = #RTL_SWH_CD#
SELECT COUNT(STS.STK_STS_CD) FROM STK_STS STS WHERE STS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND STS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND STS.STK_STS_CD = #STK_STS_CD#

SELECT CLS.ABC_ANLS_CLS_NUM FROM ABC_ANLS_CLS CLS WHERE CLS.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND CLS.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND CLS.ABC_ANLS_CLS_NM = #ABC_ANLS_CLS_NM# AND CLS.ABC_ANLS_CLS_TAG_CD = #ABC_ANLS_CLS_TAG_CD#
SELECT RQST.ABC_ANLS_RQST_PK FROM ABC_ANLS_RQST RQST WHERE RQST.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND RQST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RQST.ABC_ASG_PK = #ABC_ASG_PK# AND RQST.RQST_LTST_FLG = 'Y'

SELECT RSLT.ABC_ANLS_RSLT_PK FROM ABC_ANLS_RSLT RSLT WHERE RSLT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #GLBL_CMPY_CD# AND RSLT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RSLT.RTL_WH_CD = #RTL_WH_CD# AND RSLT.MDSE_CD = #MDSE_CD# AND RSLT.ABC_ANLS_LTST_FLG = 'Y'
